name: Hellboy: Heart Of the Tiger (prototype.)
description:
Hellboy Has just been sent thru a portal and he is sadly out of Ammo :(    But, luckily his brother Abe has dropped him off in front of the "Sword of Theo"(Press E to pick up). With That, he can hack and slash thru 10 zombies until he retrieves "The Heart of Tanak-Shoo: Demon Tiger Of Japan". Also There are plenty of Pancakes & health potions around so feel free to collect all 8 pancakes and 2 potions

  •      Inventory- I/ Select 
  • Weak ATK- L-Click /RB
  • Strong ATK- 1/RT
  • Block-R-Click /LB
  • Sprint-SHIFT /R3
  • Crouch-C /Y
  • Use Food-U/LT ( there are 3 potions total)
  • Move-WASD/JOYSTICKS
  • Use Equiptments to add your weapons and food
  • Use Items to check inventor
